description: Owen Michael’s wife has hired some new help to clean up after her messy husband. What she does not know is that her husband has the wandering eye for the dick. Diego Vena is one person who spots this wandering eye a mile away. Diego puts on a show for the stay-at-home husband who can’t help but check out the new Latin flavor his wife has provided. Owen thinks a quick blow job will do the trick but he discovers that he has an appetite for much more… which is a problem due to his wife quickly approaching arrival home.
title: Before My Wife Gets Home Part 3
